sentence.Network_en: America won't countenance any such circumvention of the sanctions.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国不会赞成任何规避制裁的行为。

sentence.Network_en: Jake would not countenance Janis's marrying while still a student.
sentence.Network_cn: 杰克不会同意贾尼斯还在上学就结婚。

sentence.Network_en: He met each inquiry with an impassive countenance.
sentence.Network_cn: 他面无表情地接受每一个盘问。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语专业考研核心词汇1200必背！（一）) - 豆丁网 ... coterie 同行, 圈内人, 伙伴 countenance 面容, 脸色, 支持 covet 垂涎, 觊觎.
英语动物词汇 - 豆丁网 ... corpse 尸体 countenance 脸色 curl 卷发.
理科高频词汇800(40份） - 豆丁网 ... cuff n． 袖口；护腕 countenance a． 面部表情；脸色 courteous a． 有礼貌的.
2. countercountenance 赞同balancing method 反平衡法

list.abs: I don ' t countenance violence in any situation ., 任何情况下 , 我都不允许暴力.
Character... ... 动人[ moving;touching;affecting] 动容[ change countenance;be visibly moved] 动态[ dynamics;development].
愁_百度百科 ... 12.愁郁[ melancholy] 13.愁云[ gloomy countenance] 14.愁云惨淡[ miserable and gloomy atmosphere].
in correspondence with 一致in countenance 镇定in couples 成对地

jx.jx_en_mean: maintain one's composure, especially by refraining from laughter
jx.jx_cn_mean: （尤指忍住不笑）不动声色；保持镇定

jx.jx_en_mean: help someone to remain calm and confident

lj.lj_ly: to keep herself in countenance she opened her notebook.
lj.lj_ls: 为保持镇定，她打开了笔记本。

lj.lj_ly: &B{I put} him clean &B{out of countenance} just by looking at him.
lj.lj_ls: 我只是看着他，就让他非常不安。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French contenance 'bearing, behaviour', from contenir (see contain). The early sense was 'bearing, demeanour', also 'facial expression', hence 'the face'

entry.def: If someone will not countenance something, they do not agree with it and will not allow it to happen.

example.ex: Jake would not countenance Janis's marrying while still a student.
example.tran: 杰克不会同意贾尼斯还在上学就结婚。

example.ex: ...the military men who refused to countenance the overthrow of the president.
example.tran: 拒绝支持推翻总统的军人们

example.ex: He met each inquiry with an impassive countenance.
example.tran: 他面无表情地接受每一个盘问。

means.word_mean: 1. the appearance conveyed by a person's face;

sentences.sentence: "a Democrat usually gets the union's endorsement"

means.word_mean: 3. the human face (`kisser' and `smiler' and `mug' are informal terms for `face' and `phiz' is British)

sentences.sentence: "She permitted her son to visit her estranged husband"
"I won't let the police search her basement"
"I cannot allow you to see your exam"

auth_sentence.content: The man flung past Martin with an angry countenance.
auth_sentence.res_content: The man flung past Martin with an angry countenance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The man flung past Martin with an angry countenance.

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Brownlow looked apprehensively at Mr. Bumble's pursed-up countenance.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr. Brownlow looked apprehensively at Mr. Bumble's pursed-up countenance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr. Brownlow looked apprehensively at Mr. Bumble's pursed-up countenance.

auth_sentence.content: Lambert says he will not countenance any talk of relegation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lambert says he will not countenance any talk of relegation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lambert says he will not countenance any talk of relegation.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =hold,表示"拿住,握住,支撑"; 2. 挽留

stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+ten拿住,握住,支撑+t→全部拿住→容量,内容;满足的
dis不+content满足的→n.不满,不满足 adj.不满的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 站得住脚的,无懈可击的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ten拿住,握住,支撑+able能……的→能拿住的
ten拿住,握住,支撑+acious多……的→拿住不放→固执的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 站不住脚的,防守不住的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+tenable[adj.站得住脚的,无懈可击的]→adj.站不住脚的,防守不住的
con全部+ten拿住,握住,支撑+t→全部拿住→容量,内容;满足的
coun=con+ten拿住,握住,支撑+ance表名词→全部控制→容忍,表示不提意见,同意
dis不+content满足的→n.不满,不满足 adj.不满的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 维修,保养,维持,保持,生活费用
stems_affixes.word_buile: main=man手+ten拿住,握住,支撑+ance表名词→用手拿住→维修,坚持
sus下面+ten支撑+ance表名词→支撑下去的东西→粮食;坚持
ten拿住,握住,支撑+acity表名词→tenacious名词

stems_affixes.value_cn: 租赁期限;租佃,租用,租赁
stems_affixes.word_buile: ten拿住,握住,支撑+ancy表名词→拿[钱]租房
ten拿住,握住,支撑+ant人→拿[钱]租房之人
ten拿住,握住,支撑+ure表名词→拿住状态
coun=con+ten拿住,握住,支撑+ance表名词→全部控制→容忍,表示不提意见,同意
fas+ten拿住,握住,支撑→v.[使]固定，系牢，绑紧，扣紧
ten拿住,握住,支撑+ant人→拿[钱]租房之人

sentences.en: Her countenance is like the flowers and the moon.
At the sight of this photograph he changed his countenance.
sentences.cn: 他一看见这张照片脸色就变了。

sentences.en: A merry heart makes a cheerful countenance.
They would not countenance our suggestion.
sentences.cn: 他们不会批准我们的建议。
